thread.title: Asbury Park Superintendent Lamont Repollet to Lead N.J. Education Commission

author: Leslie Brody
title: Asbury Park Superintendent Lamont Repollet to Lead N.J. Education Commission

organizations.name: lead n.j. education commission new jersey

text:
New Jersey Gov.-elect Phil Murphy tapped Asbury Park Schools Superintendent Lamont Repollet as state education commissioner Friday to lead a shift in the stateâ€™s approach to standardized testing and expand prekindergarten.
Mr. Repollet, 47 years old, will oversee the education of roughly 1.4 million public school students in a state that has faced decades of litigation over how to fund schools fairly. He has been chief of Asbury Park schools since 2014, leading a high-poverty district that outgoing Republican Gov. Chris Christie...
